name: Marshal's Elonian Pants
description:
Using this will unlock all weight classes of this skin.
An upgraded version of this can be crafted using recipes purchased throughout the Crystal Desert.

name: Sandstorm Lucky Draw
description:
Double-click to open a bonus prize.
<c=@flavor>Lucky you!</c>

name: Record of League Victories
description: Combine with 1 Eldritch Scroll, 50 Obsidian Shards, and 1 Cube of Stabilized Dark Energy in the Mystic Forge to create the Gift of Competitive Prowess.

name: Mini Cavalier Hero
description: Double-click to summon this mini to follow you around. Only one mini may be in use at a time.

name: Attuned Sigil of the Fool (Infused)
description: This item crackles with the infused energy of the Fractals of the Mists and is attuned to have a bonus agony infusion slot.

name: Recipe: Superior Rune of the Firebrand
Water Station Parts
description:
Double-click to gain a moderate amount of karma.
<c=@Flavor>Recover these parts to ensure the water station can remain operable, even under duress.</c>

name: Cleric's Tempered Scale Legs of the Guardian
Recipe: Superior Rune of the Scourge
Diviner's Reach Supply Case
description: A crate of supplies that should be taken to Ouna in Diviner's Reach.

name: Highjump Ranch Supply Barrel
description: A supply barrel that should be taken to Berjas at Highjump Ranch.

name: Consecrated Jackal Treat
description: A tasty treat for your jackal.

name: Recipe: Superior Rune of the Deadeye
Recipe: Mordant Warclub
description: Double-click to learn a Harrier's Mordant Warclub recipe.

name: Guardian Elemental Statue
description: This item only has value when part of a collection.

name: Chest of the Bounty Hunter's Boots
description: Double-click to choose a piece of light, medium, or heavy armor.

name: Recipe: Sunspear Sidearm
description: Double-click to learn a Sunspear sidearm recipe.

name: The Legacy Page 03
description: A book fragment worn away by the desert sands. It will need to be completed before reading. Can be consumed for Mastery experience and karma.

name: Warbeast Hardened Shoulderguard Panel
description: Used to craft Hardened Leather Shoulders.

name: Gift of War Prosperity
description: In the Mystic Forge, combine a Gift of War Prosperity, Gift of War Prowess, Gift of War Dedication, and a WvW Ascended Armor piece to upgrade the armor to Legendary.

name: Skritt Springer Treat
description: A tasty treat for your springer.

name: Warbeast Orichalcum Gauntlet Lining
description: Used to craft Orichalcum Gloves.

name: Recipe: Red Lentil Saobosa
description: Recipe Unlock: Double-click to unlock the Chef recipe for Red Lentil Saobosa.

name: Unbreakable Gathering Tools Container
description: Double-click to gain an unbreakable mining pick, logging axe, and harvesting sickle.

name: Recipe: Superior Rune of the Soulbeast
Elonian Stone Tower
description: A decoration schematic that is processed by the guild's assembly device to make the decoration.

name: Writings of the Last Spearmarshal, Vol. 7
Skimmer Treat
description:
A treat that combines the flavors of common crustaceans and three types of fish. Double-click to feed this to your skimmer.

Gives bonus Mastery experience once per day.

name: Dwarven Dagger Blade
description: A broken piece of a dwarven dagger.

name: Superior Rune of the Deadeye
description:
Element: Skill
Double-click to apply to a piece of armor.

bonuses: Apply 2 stacks of might for 15 seconds when you use a cantrip.

name: Guerrilla Arc
description: <c=@Flavor>During the rebellion against the Flame Legion, charr renegades fashioned weapons from common military surplus, with very effective results.</c>

name: Oiled Forged Scrap
description: Ingredient

name: Marshal's Elonian Gauntlets
description:
Using this will unlock all weight classes of this skin.
An upgraded version of this can be crafted using recipes purchased throughout the Crystal Desert.

name: Skimmer Treat from Basma
description: A tasty treat for your skimmer.

name: Wish for Fortitude
description: Double-click to gain a moderate amount of karma.

name: Hearty Sugar Rib
description:
Rarely drops from choya in the Crystal Desert. 
A sugary root grown in the choya village.

name: Show of Support: Sand Jackal Run
description:
Double-click to gain a moderate amount of trade contracts.
<c=@Flavor>By supporting their allies, you can strengthen ties between Amnoon and the Sunspears.</c>

name: Sand Shark Lure
description:
Grants a tiny amount of karma.
<c=@Flavor>Difficult to catch, but edible. And better in a pot than under your foot.</c>

name: Letter from Drojkor
description: A letter from Drojkor asking you to come see him back at the Djinn Enclave.

name: Awakened Bone Wall
description: A decoration schematic that is processed by the guild's assembly device to make the decoration.

name: Homespun Blindfold
description:
Grants a moderate amount of karma.

<c=@Flavor>Considered an incredible act of faith, the blindfolded pilgrimage is rarely undertaken in these times. </c>

name: Ability Reset Guide
description: Instantly reset all WvW ability points when bought.

name: Cowrie League Wood Crate
description:
Can contain hard and seasoned wood logs.
Purchase from renown region karma merchants across the Crystal Desert with trade contracts.
Find trade contracts in chests and lost supplies.

name: Dispatch Page 07
description: A book fragment worn away by the desert sands. It will need to be completed before reading. Can be consumed for Mastery experience and karma.

name: Recipe: Brandspark Amulet
description: A recipe to make a Brandspark Amulet.

name: Luminous Trumpet
description: Double-click to apply this look to any other warhorn.

name: Forged Fire Wall
description: A decoration schematic that is processed by the guild's assembly device to make the decoration.

name: Luminous Virge
description: Double-click to apply this look to any other scepter.

name: Stolen Agricultural Shipment
description:
Double-click to gain a moderate amount of karma.
<c=@Flavor>Recover this to help ensure the citizens of Elona will support Amnoon in the coming war.</c>

name: Mini Shadhavar
description: Double-click to summon this mini to follow you around. Only one mini may be in use at a time.

name: Book of Bounty Hunter Coat Recipes
description: Double-click to select a crafting recipe.

name: Dwarven Dagger Grip
description: A broken piece of a dwarven dagger.

name: Island Shoulder Skin
description: Double-click to apply this look to another piece of shoulder armor.

name: Recipe: Harrier's Warbeast Greaves
description: Double-click to learn a crafting recipe.

name: Bushel of Ancient Elon Grapes
description:
This item has no value outside of a collection and may be sold to vendors.
<c=@Flavor>Wine was valued for both leisure and trade; Primeval winemakers found that djinn are fond of sharp reds.</c>

name: Kournan Coin
description:
Grants a tiny amount of Crystal Desert Mastery experience.

<c=@Flavor>Formerly traded across Elona, but banned under Palawa Joko. These are still valued by collectors, scholars, and thieves.</c>

name: Forgeblasted Barrel
description: Double-click to open.

name: Mini Captain Rahim
description: Double-click to summon this mini to follow you around. Only one mini may be in use at a time.

name: Superior Sigil of Frenzy
description:
Element: Control
Double-click to apply to a weapon.

buff.description: Recharge all equipped skills by 2 seconds upon killing an enemy. <c=@reminder>Cooldown: 10 seconds</c>

name: Riddle of the Firebrand
description: <c=@Flavor>What illuminates may also blind.</c>

name: Insignia of the Harrier
description: Used in crafting Bounty Hunter and Warbeast armor sets, using the Harrier's (+Power, +Healing, +Concentration) stat combination.

name: Marshal's Elonian Vambraces
description:
Using this will unlock all weight classes of this skin.
An upgraded version of this can be crafted using recipes purchased throughout the Crystal Desert.

name: 28-Slot Marshal's Pannier
description: 28 slots. Weapons and armor will fill this box before other empty spaces. The contents of this box will not move when inventory is sorted. Items in this box will never appear in a sell-to-vendor list.

name: Plan for Harrier's Warbeast Shoulders
description: Double-click to select a crafting recipe.

name: Luminous Shot
description: Double-click to apply this look to any other pistol.

name: Elonian Carver
description: An upgraded version of this can be crafted using recipes purchased throughout the Crystal Desert.

name: Forgotten Holdings
description: Double-click to open.

name: Recipe: Spearmarshal's Helm
description: A recipe to make a Spearmarshal's Helm.

name: 24-Slot Courier's Pannier
description: 24 slots. Items in this box will never appear in a sell-to-vendor list and will not move when inventory is sorted.

name: Strange Feather
description: <c=@Flavor>What kind of creature has feathers this big? Perhaps the beastmaster at the Menagerie knows more. Double-click to view location.</c>

name: Book of Vlast Page 04
description: A book fragment worn away by the desert sands. It will need to be completed before reading. Can be consumed for Mastery experience and karma.

name: Book of Vlast
description: With all of the pages together, the worn text is now legible.

name: Intelligence Report: Palawa Joko I
description: With all of the pages together, the worn text is now legible.

name: Mini Griffon Mount
description: Double-click to summon this mini to follow you around. Only one mini may be in use at a time.

name: Pile of Jacarandere
description: <c=@Flavor>The spices mix with the ground Jacaranda Bloom to provide a hypnotizing aroma.</c>

name: Anniversary Backpack Pack
description: Double-click to choose an exclusive anniversary backpack.

name: Rabid Rascal Coat of the Engineer
Elonian Wood Chair
description: A decoration schematic that is processed by the guild's assembly device to make the decoration.

name: Jar of Distilled Glory
description: Combine with Record of League Participation, Star of Glory, and Condensed Spirit Energy in the Mystic Forge to create the Gift of Competitive Dedication.

name: Chest of the Bounty Hunter's Pauldrons
description: Double-click to choose a piece of light, medium, or heavy armor.

name: Hastily Written Letter
description: This thank-you note from Tasa and Aksim came with a pair of ornate, well-made riding gloves. It also suggests speaking with the priestess at the Marifa refugee camp outside of Amnoon.

name: Tale of Judgment
description:
Trade this with the traveling historian, Elisa.
<c=@Flavor>We brought law to a land that had none. Can you imagine what that takes? The discipline, the vision, the trust—and now they've turned it into this.</c>

name: Marshal's Elonian Pauldrons
description:
Using this will unlock all weight classes of this skin.
An upgraded version of this can be crafted using recipes purchased throughout the Crystal Desert.

name: Rabid Rascal Pants of the Engineer
Luminous Flange
description: Double-click to apply this look to any other mace.

name: Dwarven Axe Grip
description: A broken piece of a dwarven axe.

name: Hamaseen Wood Crate
description:
Can contain green and soft wood logs.
Purchase from renown region karma merchants across the Crystal Desert with trade contracts.
Find trade contracts in chests and lost supplies.

name: Show of Support: Garden Theatre
description:
Double-click to gain a moderate amount of trade contracts.
<c=@Flavor>By gathering support from key figures, you can cement the alliance between Amnoon and Joko.</c>

name: Mini Queen Nahlah
description: Double-click to summon this mini to follow you around. Only one mini may be in use at a time.

name: Limited-Use Realm Portal Spike Finisher
description: Summon a realm portal spike to finish your opponents.

name: Blessing of Plenty
description: Double-click to gain a reward.

name: Dwarven Hammer Shaft
description: A broken piece of a dwarven war hammer.

name: Recipe: Mordant Slicer
description: Double-click to learn a Harrier's Mordant Slicer recipe.

name: Dwarven Dagger Crossguard
description: A broken piece of a dwarven dagger.

name: House of Daoud Wood Crate
description:
Can contain ancient or elder wood logs.
Purchase from renown region karma merchants across the Crystal Desert with trade contracts.
Find trade contracts in chests and lost supplies.

name: Rabid's Backpack Strap of the Rabid
Royal Funerary Shoulder Box
description: Double-click to choose a piece of light, medium, or heavy armor.

name: Mini Dunkoro
description: Double-click to summon this mini to follow you around. Only one mini may be in use at a time.

name: Chag, Led into Darkness of Severance
Recipe: Sunspear Rod
description: Double-click to learn a Sunspear rod recipe.

name: Forged Weapon Mold
description: <c=@Flavor>Every one of these that Balthazar doesn't have means scores of lives saved.</c>

name: Breezeborne Pyxis
description: Double-click to open.

name: Bag of Death
description: Double-click to open.

name: Aloeth, Revel in Ruin of Severance
Mini Raidmarshal Sagal
description: Double-click to summon this mini to follow you around. Only one mini may be in use at a time.

name: Magnum of Mehtu's Mead
description: <c=@Flavor>The secret to this honeywine is now only known to the dead. Luckily, they're still working.</c>

name: Page of Spearmarshal Shoulder Piece Recipes
description:
Double-click to pick a recipe for Spearmarshal Shoulder Pieces. Can be learned by armorsmiths, leatherworkers, and tailors.

Purchase these recipes from renown merchants in Elona after learning the base recipes from the story.

name: Warbeast Orichalcum Chestplate Padding
description: Used to craft Orichalcum Coats.

name: Piece of Rare Unidentified Gear
description: Salvage for a reward of crafting materials, or double-click to identify and receive an item.

name: Horns of the Dragon
description: Double-click to apply this appearance to your current helm. This will unlock the skin in your wardrobe.

name: Enormous Supply of Bird Feed
description: Consuming this item provides bonus Trade Contracts.

name: Mini First Spear Dehvad
description: Double-click to summon this mini to follow you around. Only one mini may be in use at a time.

name: 28-Slot Orichalcum Locker
description: 28 Slots

name: Mini Sunspear Dume
description: Double-click to summon this mini to follow you around. Only one mini may be in use at a time.

name: Marshal's Elonian Shoulderpads
description:
Using this will unlock all weight classes of this skin.
An upgraded version of this can be crafted using recipes purchased throughout the Crystal Desert.

name: Mini Scarab
description: Double-click to summon this mini to follow you around. Only one mini may be in use at a time.

name: Cleric's Green Wood Trident of Smoldering
Dwarven Dagger Blade
description: A broken piece of a dwarven dagger.

name: Dispatch Page 01
description: A book fragment worn away by the desert sands. It will need to be completed before reading. Can be consumed for Mastery experience and karma.
